name: Wrecking Ball Defense
description:
Made for the "Make A Game Game Jam 2021" (Theme: connected)

You are a guy which is connected to a wrecking ball.

Story: Your Friend the Baloon Merchant is in Danger!!! Some thieves want to rob his shop.Luckily you and your wrecking ball are here to help!

How to play:

1. Punch thieves with the wreckingball. Don't let them to the shop the Healthbar at the top left shows the health of the shop. (You can heal your shop by buying upgrades)

(Don't spin too fast or your wracking ball will breake for a few second.)

2. After each wave the Baloon Merchent comes and sells you upgrades for your collected coins (You also have to start the next wave there).

3. Try to defend the shop the shop as long as you can maybe the thieves will stop to attack after some waves... (Maybe the waves after they stop are 10)
